name: VIDEO_SOURCE_REMOTE_VIDEO_TRANSPORT_STATS
description:
Reports the transport-layer statistics of each remote video stream.During a call, when the user receives the video packet sent by the remote user/host, the callback is triggered every 2 seconds.
        This callback reports the transport-layer statistics, such as the packet loss rate and network time delay, once every two seconds after the local user receives a video packet from a remote user.
   
                
                    Deprecated:
                    Please use VIDEO_SOURCE_REMOTE_VIDEO_STATS instead.
                
            
            The callback for the second instance.

parameters.uid: The ID of the remote user sending the video packets.

parameters.delay: The network delay (ms) from the sender to the receiver.

parameters.lost: The packet loss rate (%) of the video packet sent from the remote user.

parameters.rxKBitRate: The bitrate of the received video (Kbps).
